Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Diversey
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Diversey due to reports of an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Diversey due to reports of an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
